title: AMS NEST
description: A lot of study spots, but gets busy. Open late for night grinds.

title: UBC Bookstore
description: Find your textbooks and more.

title: Pharmaceutical Sciences Building
description: Quiet-ish with few spots on the first floor, limited plugs.

title: Woodward Library
description: Very quiet, plenty of seats with some plugs, good wifi.

title: Student Life Building
description: Usually busy, few plugs, some food and drink options.

title: School of Population and Public Health
description: Quiet basement spots, few people around.

title: Irving K. Barber Learning Centre
description: Overcrowded, lots of outlets, the classic study spot.

title: MacMillan Building
description: Agora Cafe offers comfy seating and a nice vibe, few plugs.

title: Life Sciences Institute
description: Spacious, lots of study spots, many seats with plugs.

title: Hennings Building
description: Nice study spots in the hallway, washrooms far away.

title: ICICS
description: Plenty of well-lit study space and plugs, can get busy.

title: Forestry
description: One of the prettiest buildings on campus with hard-to-come-by seats, plugs at every table, nearby Tim's.

title: Leon and Theo Koerner University Center
description: Very quiet, natural light, kitchen, few study spots, weak wifi, located by Rose Garden.

title: Brock Hall
description: Pretty quiet, not many people, lots of seats with plugs, hard to find places to sit and study.

title: LASR
description: Comfy-ish seats, many charging plugs, no desks. Great for a quick study session.

title: Iona
description: Cozy, crowded after 2pm, kitchen area with microwave, lots of plugs by the wall seats.

title: Allard Hall
description: Out of the way, plenty of seats, some with decent desks and plugs, decent wifi.

title: Asian Library
description: Quiet, empty, comfy chairs, kitchen, lots of plugs and natural light.

title: Buchanan
description: Extremely busy, hard to find spots, good amount of plugs and desk space.

title: Law Library
description: Very nice, quiet, desks with plugs and lamps, great lighting, comfy chairs.

title: David Lam Library
description: Lots of study spots, desks with plugs and private covers, comfy seats, good lighting.

title: Math Annex
description: Very nice study spot, barely any people, chargers at both tables on the second floor.

title: Swing Space
description: Nice building, great natural lighting, barely any wall plugs.

title: Koerner Library
description: Very quiet, lots of seats, decent amount of plugs, great napping spots in the basement.

title: Aquatic Centre
description: Hot and humid, no wall plugs, swimming pool smell, awkward for studying.

title: Orchard
description: Lots of study spots, good wifi, plenty of lighting and wall plugs, comfy couches for napping.

title: X̱wi7x̱wa Library
description: Very quiet, few seats and plugs, great for a silent alone study session.
